info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: List of all Recording Composition Hooks.

parameters.description: Only show Composition Hooks enabled or disabled.
parameters.name: Enabled

parameters.description: Only show Composition Hooks created on or after this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Composition Hooks created before this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Only show Composition Hooks with friendly name that match this name.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: Friendly name of the Composition Hook to be shown in the console.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: Boolean flag indicating if the Composition Hook is active.
parameters.name: Enabled

parameters.description: The JSON video layout description.
parameters.name: VideoLayout

parameters.description: A list of audio sources related to this Composition Hook.
parameters.name: AudioSources

parameters.description: A list of audio sources excluded related to this Composition Hook.
parameters.name: AudioSourcesExcluded

parameters.description: Pixel resolution of the composed video.
parameters.name: Resolution

parameters.description: Container format of the Composition Hook media file. Any of the following: `mp4`, `webm`.
parameters.name: Format

parameters.description: A URL that Twilio sends asynchronous webhook requests to on every composition event.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL.
parameters.name: StatusCallbackMethod

parameters.description: Boolean flag for clipping intervals that have no media.
parameters.name: Trim

delete.description: Delete a Recording Composition Hook Instance resource identified by a `CompositionHookSid`.

parameters.description: The Recording Composition Hook Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording Composition Hook to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Returns a single Composition Hook Instance resource identified by a CompositionHookSid.

parameters.description: The Composition Hook Sid that uniquely identifies the Composition Hook to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies the Composition Hook to update, specified as a path parameter.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Friendly name of the Composition Hook to be shown in the console.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: Boolean flag indicating if the Composition Hook is active.
parameters.name: Enabled

parameters.description: The JSON video layout description.
parameters.name: VideoLayout

parameters.description: A list of audio sources related to this Composition Hook.
parameters.name: AudioSources

parameters.description: A list of audio sources excluded related to this Composition Hook.
parameters.name: AudioSourcesExcluded

parameters.description: Boolean flag for clipping intervals that have no media.
parameters.name: Trim

parameters.description: Container format of the Composition Hook media file. Any of the following: `mp4`, `webm`.
parameters.name: Format

parameters.description: Pixel resolution of the composed video.
parameters.name: Resolution

parameters.description: A URL that Twilio sends asynchronous webhook requests to on every composition event.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL.
parameters.name: StatusCallbackMethod

parameters.description: Friendly name of the configuration to be shown in the console
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: SID of the Stored Credential resource CRxx
parameters.name: AwsCredentialsSid

parameters.description: SID of the Public Key resource CRxx
parameters.name: EncryptionKeySid

parameters.description: Identity of the external location where the compositions should be stored. We only support DNS-compliant URLs like http://<my-bucket>.s3-<aws-region>.amazonaws.com/compositions, where compositions is the path where you want compositions to be stored.
parameters.name: AwsS3Url

parameters.description: true|false When set to true, all Compositions will be written to the AwsS3Url specified above. When set to false, all Compositions will be stored in Twilio's cloud.
parameters.name: AwsStorageEnabled

parameters.description: true|false When set to true, all Compositions will be stored encrypted.
parameters.name: EncryptionEnabled

parameters.description: Only show Compositions with the given status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show Compositions created on or after this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Compositions created before this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Only show Compositions with the given Room SID.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Twilio Room SID.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: The JSON video layout description.
parameters.name: VideoLayout

parameters.description: A list of audio sources related to this Composition.
parameters.name: AudioSources

parameters.description: A list of audio sources excluded related to this Composition.
parameters.name: AudioSourcesExcluded

parameters.description: Pixel resolution of the composed video.
parameters.name: Resolution

parameters.description: Container format of the Composition media file. Any of the following: `mp4`, `webm`.
parameters.name: Format

parameters.description: A URL that Twilio sends asynchronous webhook requests to on every composition event.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL.
parameters.name: StatusCallbackMethod

parameters.description: Boolean flag for clipping intervals that have no media.
parameters.name: Trim

get.description: Retrieves the media file associated to a given Composition Instance resource identified by a `CompositionSid`.

parameters.description: The Composition Sid that uniquely identifies the Composition media to fetch.
parameters.name: CompositionSid

parameters.description: Duration in seconds for which the `redirect_to` URL can be used.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Sets the `Content-Disposition` header of the `redirect_to` URL.
parameters.name: ContentDisposition

delete.description: Delete a Recording Composition Instance resource identified by a `CompositionSid`.

parameters.description: The Recording Composition Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording Composition to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Returns a single Composition Instance resource identified by a CompositionSid.

parameters.description: The Composition Sid that uniquely identifies the Composition to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Friendly name of the configuration to be shown in the console
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: SID of the Stored Credential resource CRxx
parameters.name: AwsCredentialsSid

parameters.description: SID of the Public Key resource CRxx
parameters.name: EncryptionKeySid

parameters.description: Identity of the external location where the recordings should be stored. We only support DNS-compliant URLs like http://<my-bucket>.s3-<aws-region>.amazonaws.com/recordings, where recordings is the path where you want recordings to be stored.
parameters.name: AwsS3Url

parameters.description: true|false When set to true, all Recordings will be written to the AwsS3Url specified above. When set to false, all Recordings will be stored in Twilio's cloud.
parameters.name: AwsStorageEnabled

parameters.description: true|false When set to true, all Recordings will be stored encrypted.
parameters.name: EncryptionEnabled

parameters.description: Only show Recordings with the given status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show the Recordings with the given source Sid.
parameters.name: SourceSid

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that have this GroupingSid.
parameters.name: GroupingSid

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that started on or after this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that started before this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that have this media type.
parameters.name: MediaType

get.description: Retrieves the media file associated to a given Recording Instance resource identified by a `RecordingSid`.

parameters.description: The Recording Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording media to fetch.
parameters.name: RecordingSid

parameters.description: Duration in seconds for which the `redirect_to` URL can be used.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Sets the `Content-Disposition` header of the `redirect_to` URL.
parameters.name: ContentDisposition

delete.description: Delete a Recording Instance resource identified by a RecordingSid.

parameters.description: The Recording Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Returns a single Recording Instance resource identified by a RecordingSid.

parameters.description: The Recording Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

/v1/Rooms.description: Video rooms with one or more participants

parameters.description: Only show Rooms with the given status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show Rooms with the provided Name.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Only show Rooms that started on or after this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Rooms that started before this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Use Twilio Network Traversal for TURN service.
parameters.name: EnableTurn

parameters.description: Type of room, either peer-to-peer, group-small or group.
parameters.name: Type

parameters.description: Name of the Room.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: A URL that Twilio sends asynchronous webhook requests to on every room event.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL.
parameters.name: StatusCallbackMethod

parameters.description: Maximum number of Participants in the Room.
parameters.name: MaxParticipants

parameters.description: Start Participant recording when connected.
parameters.name: RecordParticipantsOnConnect

parameters.description: An array of video codecs supported when publishing a Track in the Room.
parameters.name: VideoCodecs

parameters.description: Region for the media server in Group Rooms.
parameters.name: MediaRegion

parameters.description: A system-generated 34-character string that uniquely identifies this Room.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Only show Participants with the given Status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show Participants that connected to the Room using the provided Identity.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: Only show Participants that started after this date, given as an UTC ISO 8601 Timestamp.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Participants that started before this date, given as an UTC ISO 8601 Timestamp.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

/v1/Rooms/{RoomSid}/Participants/{Partic.description: Audio or video tracks being published by a participant

get.description: Returns a list of tracks associated with a given Participant. Only `currently` Published Tracks are in the list resource.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where this Track is published.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier that publishes this Track.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

/v1/Rooms/{RoomSid}/Participants/{Partic.description: Audio or video tracks being published by a participant

get.description: Returns a single Track resource represented by `TrackNameOrSid`.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where this Track is published.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier that publishes this Track.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Returns a list of Subscribe Rules for the Participant.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where the Subscribe Rules apply
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier to apply Subscribe Rules.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

post.description: Update the Subscribe Rules for the Participant

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where the Subscribe Rules apply
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier to apply Subscribe Rules.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

parameters.description: A JSON-encoded array of Subscribe Rules.
parameters.name: Rules

get.description: Returns a list of tracks that are subscribed for the participant.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where the Tracks are subscribed.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier that subscribes to this Track.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

get.description: Returns a single Track resource represented by `TrackSid`.  Note: This is one resource with the Video API that requires a Sid, as Track Name on the subscriber side is not guaranteed to be unique.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where this Track is subscribed.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier that subscribes to this Track.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A system-generated 34-character string that uniquely identifies a Room.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: A system-generated 34-character string that uniquely identifies this Participant.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A system-generated 34-character string that uniquely identifies a Room.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: A system-generated 34-character string that uniquely identifies this Participant.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Set to `disconnected` to remove participant.
parameters.name: Status

/v1/Rooms/{Sid}.description: Video rooms with one or more participants

parameters.description: The Room Sid or name that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The Room Sid or name that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Set to completed to end the Room.
parameters.name: Status

tags.name: Beta

tags.description: PLEASE NOTE that this is a Preview product that is subject to change. Use it with caution. If you currently do not have developer preview access, please contact help@twilio.com.
tags.name: Preview
